Package org.oddjob.arooa.design.designer

Classes for the Swing Designer Panels.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArooaContainer  
    ArooaContainer.DropPoint  
    DesignerModelListener  
    MenuProvider
    Provides menus for a Swing view.
    PopupMenuProvider
    Something that can provide a Popup Menu.
    TransferEventListener
    Listener for events from an ArooaTransferHandler.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArooaDesigner  
    ArooaDesignerForm
    The Designer dialogue form.
    ArooaDesignerFormView
    The Swing GUI designer dialogue for Oddjob.
    ArooaTransferHandler
    A TransferHandler for an ArooaTree.
    ArooaTree
    A base for Swing JTree sub classes that are able to provide a DragPoint for the manipulation of an underlying ArooaConfiguration.
    DesignerDetail
    The Swing component that contains the design form for the currently selected component, or is blank.
    DesignerEditActions
    Adds enabled/disabled functionality to the standard edit actions.
    DesignerErrorEvent  
    DesignerModel
    Model for a designer session.
    DesignerModelEvent  
    DesignerPanel
    The tree view.
    DesignTreeModel
    The Swing Tree Model of a Design.
    DesignTreeNode
    This class wraps a DesignComponent allowing it to act as a TreeNode.
    TransferEvent
    Event broadcast from an ArooaTransferHandler.
    ViewActionsContributor
    Provides the designers 'View As XML' and 'View As Component' actions.
